And you may turn up the day after (or the day after that, because you may sit at home, giving yourself some reprieve while eating your body weight in French boulangerie treats - almost a cliche, but a cliche for a DAMN good reason). But at some point, you go back to clown school, put on your sweaty tracksuit pants, and you realise you were basically cancelled in realtime on stage on Tuesday, but on Thursday you made the French master clown and his wi
